.. _`bio/samtools/faidx`:

SAMTOOLS FAIDX
==============

index reference sequence in FASTA format from reference sequence. For more information see `SAMtools documentation <http://www.htslib.org/doc/samtools-faidx.html>`_.

**URL**: 

Example
-------

This wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule samtools_index:
        input:
            "{sample}.fa"
        output:
            "{sample}.fa.fai"
        params:
            "" # optional params string
        wrapper:
            "0.50.4-2418-g8fefa1e53/bio/samtools/faidx"

Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.

When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.

Software dependencies
---------------------

* ``samtools==1.10``

Input/Output
------------
**Input:**

* reference sequence file (.fa)

**Output:**

* indexed reference sequence file (.fai)
